name: KunutzaDestroyer
description:
Kunutza Destoyer is a game that you have to destroy planets (by dashing) .The spawn rates of the planet increase as you get more points(higher score) .In addition, there are some alien devices that can destroy your player so be careful.

Keybinds:

Press escape to return to the start scene

shift + w/a/s/d = dash
